author: Olivia Stefanovich
title: Liberals propose 5 days of question period be condensed into 2 during COVID-19 pandemic
description: The Trudeau government has made a new offer to opposition parties to restart Parliament on Wednesday and compress five days of question period into two during the COVID-19 pandemic, CBC News has learned.
content:
The Trudeau government made a new offer to opposition parties late Saturday afternoon to restart Parliament on Wednesday and compress five days of question period into two during the COVID-19 pandemic, CBC News has learned.
